verses.kjv: Rejoice in the LORD, O ye righteous: for praise is comely for the upright.
verses.ct: Celebrate the LORD, you who are righteous — praise is fitting for those who live with integrity.

verses.kjv: Praise the LORD with harp: sing unto him with the psaltery and an instrument of ten strings.
verses.ct: Worship the LORD with the harp; make music to him with the lyre and the 10-stringed instrument.

verses.kjv: Sing unto him a new song; play skilfully with a loud noise.
verses.ct: Sing a fresh song to him; play with skill and shout with joy.

verses.kjv: For the word of the LORD is right; and all his works are done in truth.
verses.ct: The LORD's word is trustworthy, and everything he does is grounded in faithfulness.

verses.kjv: He loveth righteousness and judgment: the earth is full of the goodness of the LORD.
verses.ct: He loves righteousness and justice; the earth overflows with the LORD's loyal love.

verses.kjv: By the word of the LORD were the heavens made; and all the host of them by the breath of his mouth.
verses.ct: The heavens were created by the LORD's word, and all their countless stars by the breath of his mouth.

verses.kjv: He gathereth the waters of the sea together as an heap: he layeth up the depth in storehouses.
verses.ct: He piles up the ocean waters like a mound; he stores the deep seas in vaults.

verses.kjv: Let all the earth fear the LORD: let all the inhabitants of the world stand in awe of him.
verses.ct: Let everyone on earth deeply revere the LORD; let all who live in the world stand in awe of him.

verses.kjv: For he spake, and it was done; he commanded, and it stood fast.
verses.ct: He spoke, and it came into existence; he gave the command, and it stood firm.

verses.kjv: The LORD bringeth the counsel of the heathen to nought: he maketh the devices of the people of none effect.
verses.ct: The LORD ruins the plans of the nations; he frustrates the schemes of the peoples.

verses.kjv: The counsel of the LORD standeth for ever, the thoughts of his heart to all generations.
verses.ct: But the LORD's plans stand forever, the purposes of his heart through every generation.

verses.kjv: Blessed is the nation whose God is the LORD; and the people whom he hath chosen for his own inheritance.
verses.ct: How fortunate is the nation whose God is the LORD — the people he has chosen as his own possession.

verses.kjv: The LORD looketh from heaven; he beholdeth all the sons of men.
verses.ct: The LORD looks down from heaven; he observes all of humanity.

verses.kjv: From the place of his habitation he looketh upon all the inhabitants of the earth.
verses.ct: From the place where he dwells, he watches over everyone living on earth.

verses.kjv: He fashioneth their hearts alike; he considereth all their works.
verses.ct: He shaped each of their hearts, and he pays attention to everything they do.

verses.kjv: There is no king saved by the multitude of an host: a mighty man is not delivered by much strength.
verses.ct: No king is rescued by the size of his army; no warrior escapes danger through sheer strength.

verses.kjv: An horse is a vain thing for safety: neither shall he deliver any by his great strength.
verses.ct: A war horse is a false hope for victory — even its great power cannot save anyone.

verses.kjv: Behold, the eye of the LORD is upon them that fear him, upon them that hope in his mercy;
verses.ct: Pay attention — the LORD watches over those who deeply revere him, those who put their hope in his mercy,

verses.kjv: To deliver their soul from death, and to keep them alive in famine.
verses.ct: to rescue their soul from death and to keep them alive during famine.

verses.kjv: Our soul waiteth for the LORD: he is our help and our shield.
verses.ct: Our soul waits expectantly for the LORD; he is our help and our shield.

verses.kjv: For our heart shall rejoice in him, because we have trusted in his holy name.
verses.ct: Our hearts find their joy in him, because we have placed our trust in his holy name.

verses.kjv: Let thy mercy, O LORD, be upon us, according as we hope in thee.
verses.ct: Let your mercy rest on us, LORD, just as we have placed our hope in you.
